title: Having a Ball (Bag) with BG Meyer Standard Issue
itunes:title: Having a Ball (Bag) with BG Meyer Standard Issue
description: The Cigar Authority smokes some cigars, including the BG Meyer Standard Issue, Hammer + Sicke as we explore cigar shop etiquette along with Cigar Reviews & Cigar News.
